item.title: Jerry's Pool, 0% Forever.
item.description: Jerry’s Pool is a Validator Node on the Crypto.org Chain with 0% commission rate. I don’t collect any fees, period. Technical Details Operator Address: crocncl1s7cu28403gzdvy5tttyskm3zxjejxcv6j5ngp9 Links Get updates on Telegram View project on Trello Contact me on Twitter / Email Tips on choosing your staking node Work In Progress Some projects I am working on: CRO Yield Optimizer
